comment: Primary Key for the NOTE table.

description: Unique identifier for the person associated with the note.
Datetime the note was recorded. If time is not given, set to midnight.
Concept ID representing the provenance of the note (e.g., EHR record).
Standard Concept ID representing the HL7 LOINC Document Type Vocabulary classification of the note.

comment: Full text content of the note.

description: Concept representing the character encoding type (e.g., UTF-8).
Concept representing the language of the note.
Visit during which the note was written.
Visit Detail during which the note was written.
Source value mapped to the NOTE_CLASS_CONCEPT_ID.
Primary key of the linked record related to the note, if applicable.
Concept ID identifying the table and field the linked record belongs to.
